message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $15000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best value while recognizing your potential to benefit greatly from this investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
I'm interested in the product, but $15000 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
